LEVEL_BETWEEN_SHOW_AD.description: The number of levels to pass to display the next ad since the previous one

DURATION_BETWEEN_SHOW_AD.description: The time it takes to show the next ad since the previous one (in seconds)

FIRST_TIME_LEVEL_SHOW_AD.description: The number of levels to pass the first time when opening the game to display ads

TURN_ON_AD.description: Can ads be displayed in the game?  true: can display ads in the game  false: no ads will be displayed in the game

USING_ADMOB.description: true: use admob to show ad.  false: use applovin to show ad
